Forwarded From Air Force Commander Mykola Oleschuk?? 30 ATTACK UAVS SHOT DOWN On the night of August 7, 2024, the Russian occupiers attacked with "Shahed" type UAVs from the Primorsko-Akhtarsk, Yeisk - RF. Radio-technical troops 30 attack drones were detected and escorted by the Air Force. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, all enemy UAVs were shot down in the Kyiv, Khmelnytskyi, Vinnytsia, Mykolaiv, Kherson, Kharkiv and Cherkasy regions. The forces and means of the mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, anti-aircraft missile units and EW of the Air Force were used. Thank you for the combat work!?? Together ? to victory!
